references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n)*sqrt(n)/2^n is bounded: lim sup a(n)*sqrt(n)/2^n = 0.82... and lim inf a(n)*sqrt(n)/2^n = 0.58... - _Benoit Cloitre_, Nov 14 2003Binomial transform of the characteristic function of squares A010052. - _Carl Najafi_, Sep 09 2011
mathematica: Table[Sum[Binomial[n, k^2], {k, 0, Sqrt[n]}], {n, 0, 50}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Sep 10 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Henry W. Gould_
